COLOR_BACKGROUND_PATH_COMPLETE.comment: The background color for Salespath stages that are complete.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_PATH_COMPLETE_HOVER.comment: The hover background color for Salespath stages that are complete.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_PATH_CURRENT.comment: The background color for Salespath stages that are the current stage.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_PATH_CURRENT_HOVER.comment: The hover background color for Salespath stages that are the current stage.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_PATH_INCOMPLETE.comment: The background color for Salespath stages that have not been completed.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_PATH_INCOMPLETE_HOVER.comment: The hover background color for Salespath stages that have not been completed.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_PATH_LOST.comment: The background color for the final stage of a Salespath when it has been lost.

COLOR_BACKGROUND_GUIDANCE.comment: The background color for Salespath guidance coaching section.
